events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to receiving the incorrect product.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm here to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number for verification?
I have attached the photo of the wrong product and my order number is 123456. Please process the refund quickly.
We apologize for the mistake. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for your quick response and resolution. I appreciate the help with this refund.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the case is now considered resolved.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been processed and confirmed, this case will now be formally closed. Thank you for your patience.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to you. We would appreciate your feedback on our support service.
